sentences.en: For photoflash , lead wire type, small size, Low loss factor, high stability.
sentences.cn: 闪光灯用引线式产品，体积小，损耗小，性能稳定。

sentences.en: For photoflash , lug type, low loss factor and low leakage current.
sentences.cn: 闪光灯用产品，具有低损耗，低漏电等特点。

sentences.en: For photoflash, lead wire type, small size, Low loss factor, high stability.
sentences.cn: 闪光灯用引线式产品, 体积小, 损耗小, 性能稳定.

sentences.en: For photoflash, lug type, low loss factor and low leakage current.
sentences.cn: 闪光灯用焊片式产品, 具有低损耗, 低漏电等特点.

sentences.en: For photoflash, lug type, miniaturized, low leakage current reduces battery consumption.
sentences.cn: 闪光灯用焊片式缩体产品, 漏电流小, 可减少电池消耗.

sentences.en: Seven years later, through his work with Harold Eugene Edgerton of MIT, he made several photographic experiences of capturing sequences of actions using photoflash to immobilize the scene.
sentences.cn: 7年以后，通过与麻省理工学院 Harold Eugene Edgerton的合作，他进行了几次摄影的尝试，捕捉一系列运动的场景通过闪光灯来使画面固定。

sentences.en: Something seems wrong with the photoflash in my camera.
sentences.cn: 我相机的闪光灯似乎有毛病.

sentences.en: You'd better apply a photoflash if you take a photo in a room.
sentences.cn: 如果在室内拍照,你最好用一只闪光灯.

trans.tran_cn: 照相闪光灯的，使用闪光灯的
